post.description: Enpoint to create a api admin user

requestBody.description: Enpoint to create a api admin user

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/admin/users" 
    -d "name"="c!"Qc'KD#Q[V" \
    -d "email"=";Eg[ltA^bSy~" \
    -d "password"="B$yKsq0Mp(WP"

post.description: Enpoint to create a BearerAuth token

requestBody.description: Enpoint to create a BearerAuth token

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/admin/users/token" 
    -d "email"="ECcycu_'G*O+" \
    -d "password"="JpC2#On&}6/("
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/leaderboards"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/leaderboards"

delete.operationId: This method performs a soft delete in order to avoid data lost by mistake

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}"
curl -X PATCH "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}/enable"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}/players"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}/players"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}/players/{player_id}/rank"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/leaderboards/{leaderboard_id}/players/{player_id}/rank/around/{records_around}"
